name: The "H" Bible Quiz | Bible Alphabetics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Naarah had two sons that fit into this quiz. One was Hepher. Who was the other?
questions.explanation:
Haahashtari.

	His other two brothers were Azuzam and Temeni. Asher was the father. Haahshtari means "a runner".

questions.text: Who reigned over Avith after Husham died?
questions.explanation:
Hadad.

	Hadad was the son of Badad (Genesis 36:35 KJV). After Hadad died a man named Samlah reigned (Genesis 36:36 KJV).

questions.text: What other name was Esther born with?
questions.explanation:
Hadassah.

	Hadassah was a Jewish woman who was married to King Xerxes. A man named Haman wanted to kill all the Jews but Hadassah saved her people by having favor with the king. You can read about this in the book of Esther.

Hagar.

	You can read about Hagar in chapter 22 of Genesis. Hagar was Sarah's servant. God told Sarah she would have a baby when she was very old. When she didn't get pregnant she decided to take matters into her own hand. She had her husband Abraham sleep with Hagar so he would produce an heir. Then Sarah became jealous and became very mean toward Hagar and Ishmael, eventually demanding they be banished.

questions.text: The word heinous only appears once in the KJV. Where is it found?
questions.explanation:
Job 31:11.

	Job suffered a lot and had become very frustrated at this point. He eventually ends up talking to God or more like God talked to him, and Job realized he had been prideful and that God was in total control.

questions.text: When Jacob heard men had raped Dinah, his daughter, what did he do until his sons returned?
questions.explanation:
held his peace.

	The story is found in Genesis 34. Jacob's sons end up tricking the men who raped Dinah into getting circumcised. Then while they were all in great pain, her brothers killed all the men.

questions.text: What did the Psalmist say in Psalm 86:13 (KJV) he was saved from the lowest point of?
questions.explanation:
Hell.

	He also talks about God's great mercy. Psalm 86 is one of the Psalms of praise in which God is glorified for all he does.

questions.text: What did the people cry when Jesus made his triumphal entrance into Jerusalem according to the KJV of Matthew 21:9?
questions.explanation:
Hosanna in the highest!.

	Hosanna means "Hooray or Hallelujah". This time period is what many Christians now call Palm Sunday. Less than a week later the same people singing Jesus' praises were yelling, "Crucify Him! Crucify Him!"

questions.text: Who is told to marry a whore?
questions.explanation:
Hosea.

	Hosea 1:2 (KJV) says, "The beginning of the word of the Lord by Hosea. And the Lord said to Hosea, Go, take unto thee a wife of whoredoms and children of whoredoms: for the land hath committed great whoredom, departing from the Lord."  The next verse said he took a woman named Gomer.

questions.text: According to 2 Kings 14:13-14 of the King James Version, what did King Jehoash take back to Samaria?
questions.explanation:
hostages.

	Jehoash's name means "Yahweh has given". He reigned for 16 years.
